ComicInfo.Summary:
Tommy, Az, the President, and the other survivors are stranded amidst the most nightmarish menagerie of Zombie Animals imaginable! All-star creators Kevin Eastman (TMNT), Joshua Ortega (Gears of War), and Digger T Mesch (Agent 88) join up with rising star Qing Ping Mui for the action-packed conclusion of the year’s most talked-about and critically acclaimed new horror series!
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------ Reg | Regular Cover | Sam Shearon | 1 | Sub | Subscription Cover | Kevin Eastman (a), David Millgate (a) & Blond (c) | 2 | RI | Retailer Incentive Cover | Shane Pierce | 3 |
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-11-26 18:58:53. [CVDB448027]
ComicInfo.Inker: James E. Lyle, José Avilés, Michael Shoyket, Qing Ping Mui, Qing Ping Mui
ComicInfo.CoverArtist: Blond, David Millgate, Sam Shearon, Shane Pierce
